comment: I want to like this app, but with the handwriting feature not working properly, it's hard to. When you click the handwriting button, a "Write Here" box is supposed to display so you can transcribe characters or words, but it only comes up every now and then. My app is up to date and still can't overcome this problem. I even asked the google community with no help, so until that is fixed, I'll have to translate with something else.
scenarios: Click the handwriting button expecting a "Write Here" box to display for transcribing characters or words, but it only appears intermittently.
key sentence: Click the handwriting button expecting a "Write Here" box to display for transcribing characters or words, but it only appears intermittently.
